# Full feature example


## Load data

```{r}
data(Europe)
data(rivers)
data(cities)
data(airports)
```


```{r}
geo_shape(Europe[3,]) +
	geo_borders() +
	geo_fill("pop_est_dens", style="kmeans") +
geo_shape(rivers) +
	geo_lines(col="blue", lwd="strokelwd") +
geo_shape(cities) +
	geo_text("name", cex="pop_max", root=3, scale=1.5, bg.alpha=0, ymod=-.015) +
	geo_bubbles("pop_max", col="capital") +
geo_theme_Europe(legend.config=c("fill_hist", "fill", "bubble.size", "bubble.col"))
	
```
